ministry: Maharashtra Housing and Area Development Authority
description: Construction and allotment of residential tenements and plots across various income categories through Maharashtra Housing and Area Development Authority.

other_conditions: Schemes include: Subsidised Industrial Housing Scheme (SIHS), EWS, LIG, MIG, HIG tenements and plots
Active projects in Satpur, Nashik, Panchawati, Deolali, Amrutdham, Mhasrul, Pathardi, Adgaon, Chunchale, Malegaon, Ahmadnagar, Bhusawal, Jalgaon, Manmad, Yeola, Dhule, Nandurbar, Chalisgaon, Amalner

benefits: Construction of affordable tenements and development of plots
Allotment of residential and non-residential tenements
Transit tenements for occupants of old/cessed buildings

steps: Check MHADA website for scheme announcements
Submit application to respective Regional Board
